experiences.description: Acted as Frontend Leader in a cross-functional team, contributing to the planning and development of new features. Took initiative to guide our approach with a focus on performance and scalable components. Led the implementation of UI structures using React, Next.js, and Tailwind, and helped reduce average page load times to ~2 seconds. Also participated proactively in structuring and implementing backend features using Supabase and SQL.

Collaborated with the core team and design lead to plan and build a new project from scratch. Contributed to full-stack development using Next.js and Supabase, while following good practices in UI structure, responsiveness, and accessibility.

Contributed to the development of calendar and scheduling features in a growing SaaS platform. Maintained and refactored reusable UI components using React and TypeScript, improving code readability and consistency across the app.
